nodes.text: Lazna Delothrea was a female Human citizen of the Eternal Empire of Zakuul. A captain within the Knights of Zakuul, she participated in the Battle of Asylum in 3631 BBY. During the battle she engaged Koth Vortena and The Commander, but was defeated and killed.
Captain Lazna Delothrea appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire Chapter 8: Return.
